Question.Title: What process should the Government use to set a new emissions reduction target in legislation?

Answer.Option: The Government sets a 2050 target in legislation now
Answer.Textbox: NZ (businesses, iwi, communities and households) needs certainty to act fast now. more…

Answer.Option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
Answer.Textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

Question.Title: How should New Zealand meet its targets?

Answer.Option: Domestic emissions reductions only (including from new forest planting).
Answer.Textbox: NZ (businesses, iwi, communities and households) needs certainty to act fast now. International emissions units will be volatile in price - and relying on these undermines decisive domestic investment here in NZ. more…

Answer.Option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
Answer.Textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

Answer.Option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
Answer.Textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

Answer.Textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.
